lead_paragraph: Cleveland Cavaliers forward Kevin Love was cleared to fly home with the team on Monday, but his availability for Game 3 of the NBA Finals on Wednesday night at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland remains in question.

headline.print_headline: Love Returns to Cleveland, Uncertain for Game Three
headline.main: Love Returns to Cleveland, Uncertain for Game Three
